name: "Call You Mother" reminder card/mother's day card/just because/envelope included
description:
Are you or a loved-one overdue for a call? Send a friendly reminder to the offender with this large-as-life greeting card.

¤¤¤
TITLE:
"CALL YOUR MOTHER"

SIZE:
8.5"x5.5" inches [A9] ¤ Email me [studiofusco@fuscopress.com] with requests.

PAPER:
Professional photo card stock. Paper is easy to write on.

FINISH:
Matte finish.

SHIPPING:
All cards will be packaged with cardboard backing for safe delivery.

¤¤¤
NOTES:
¤ Any custom text requests [1-3 lines max] can be emailed to us. We will send you confirmation when your customization is complete.
¤ All cards designed, printed, scored, folded, and shipped by us. Matching envelope included.
¤ Cell phone shown in photo (which will likely be lost or stolen any day now) not included in purchase.

Copyright © 2012 Studio Fusco. All Rights Reserved.
